entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deconstruct works inconsistently in patterns and in deconstruction into tuple #74852

Closed

  • Inheritance margin doesn't work well with screen scaling #74035
    17.12
  • CS9203 False Positive #74854

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix copilot options default value handling #74867
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix handling default copilot option values #74866
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use InterceptorsNamespaces feature name instead of InterceptorsPreviewNamespaces #74865
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update Code Clean up Fixer to Support Async Code Cleanup on Save #74861
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Standardize on NET pre-proc symbol #74859
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #74848
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Expose disposing capability on IAssemblyLoaderInternal #74845
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report nullable ctor warnings for struct primary constructors #74844
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • test for rename exclusion #74843
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Skip ValidateVisualBasicTemplateProjects failing on CI due to AVE #74831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix error closing source link documents in VSCode #74862
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Adds MicrosoftIdentityModelJsonWebTokensVersion to Versions.prop #74864
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Always make project changes using the 'batch scope' approach to reduce duplication. #74863
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Hook up file watchers for analyzer references #74858
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Move type to its own file #74857
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Set ScaleFactor for inheritance margin context menu #74849
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Reduce allocations from newline information allocated by ChangedText.GetLinesCore #74728
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #74850
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #74847
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74846
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #74740
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #74825
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, VSCode

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74869
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add option for LSP based auto-insert #74485
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update dartlab pipeline #74811
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make host outputs public #74750
    Area-Compilers, Needs API Review
  • Async rename commit #74794
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process #74780
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Field-backed properties: update uses of IsAutoProperty #74798
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize usage of `Stack<T>` in SyntaxNavigator #74813
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: don't provide snippets when dotting of a type name #74841
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Support rename and resolve multiple symbols in one solution snapshot #63588
  • Allow suppressing nullability warnings in more ref scenarios #74498
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Allow ref enumerators in async/iterator methods #74800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Workaround failure to declare GenerateManifests as a dependency of _CopyResolvedFilesToPublishPreserveNewest #74842
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
